p: The study received approval from the Ethics and Research Committee of the North-West University (approval number: NWU-00607-17-A9) and permission was granted by the NW Department of Health. Voluntary, written informed consent was obtained from all the participants and they were informed of their rights to withdraw from the study at any time. The data collected were recorded after permission was granted and were kept safe and locked. Privacy, anonymity and confidentiality in all procedures were maintained in the spirit of ethical conduct.
